content.rendered:
The 2023 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) will feature several autograph sessions where fans can meet their favorite rodeo stars. Here is the full schedule for the autograph sessions:

  1. Barrel Racers Autograph Session: This session will take place on Friday, December 8, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the Golden Nugget in The Grand Event Center Foyer.
  2. Tie-Down Ropers Autograph Session: This session is scheduled for Saturday, December 9, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the MGM Grand in the Main Lobby.
  3. Team Ropers Autograph Session: This session will be held on Monday, December 11, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at Horseshoe Las Vegas in Guy Fieri’s Flavortown Sports Kitchen.
  4. Steer Wrestlers Autograph Session: This session will take place on Tuesday, December 12, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at The D in Bar Canada.
  5. Bull Riders Autograph Session: This session is scheduled for Wednesday, December 13, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at Treasure Island Las Vegas in Gilley’s Saloon.
  6. Bareback Riders Autograph Session: This session will be held on Thursday, December 14, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at Beerhaus in New York-New York.
  7. Saddle Bronc Riders Autograph Session: This session will take place on Friday, December 15, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at Resorts World in the Wrangler Dawg House.

All autograph sessions are free to attend and open to the public. They operate on a first-come, first-served basis, and the contestants depart at 1 p.m.

These sessions provide a unique opportunity for fans to meet their favorite rodeo stars and get their autographs, making the NFR experience even more memorable.

@graph.description: Golam Muktadir is a passionate sports fan and a dedicated movie buff. He has been writing about both topics for over a decade and has a wealth of knowledge and experience to share with his readers. Muktadir has a degree in journalism and has written for several well-known publications, including Surprise Sports.
